AllocateDBInstanceSrvNetworkAddress.title: AllocateDBInstanceSrvNetworkAddress
AllocateDBInstanceSrvNetworkAddress.summary: Applies for an SRV connection string for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

AllocateNodePrivateNetworkAddress.title: AllocateNodePrivateNetworkAddress
AllocateNodePrivateNetworkAddress.summary: Applies for an internal endpoint for a shard or Configserver node in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

AllocatePublicNetworkAddress.title: AllocatePublicNetworkAddress
AllocatePublicNetworkAddress.summary: Allocates a public endpoint to an instance.

CancelActiveOperationTasks.title: CancelActiveOperationTasks
CancelActiveOperationTasks.summary: Cancels Operations and Maintenance (O&M) events in a batch.

CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.title: CheckCloudResourceAuthorized
CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.summary: Checks whether Key Management Service (KMS) keys are authorized to an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

CheckRecoveryCondition.title: CheckRecoveryCondition
CheckRecoveryCondition.summary: Queries whether the data of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance can be restored.

CheckServiceLinkedRole.title: CheckServiceLinkedRole
CheckServiceLinkedRole.summary: Checks whether a service-linked role (SLR) is created for an instance.

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates an account that is granted read-only permissions for shard nodes in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance that uses cloud disks.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Creates a backup for a MongoDB instance.

CreateDBInstance.title: CreateDBInstance
CreateDBInstance.summary: Creates or clones an ApsaraDB for MongoDB replica set instance.

CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup
CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Creates a global IP whitelist template.

CreateNode.title: CreateNode
CreateNode.summary: Adds a shard or mongos node to an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

CreateNodeBatch.title: CreateNodeBatch
CreateNodeBatch.summary: Batch adds mongos or shard nodes for a sharded cluster instance.

CreateNodeRoleTag.title: CreateNodeRoleTag
CreateNodeRoleTag.summary: Creates a role tag for an instance node.

CreateShardingDBInstance.title: CreateShardingDBInstance
CreateShardingDBInstance.summary: Creates or clones a MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup
DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Deletes a global IP address whitelist template.

DeleteNode.title: DeleteNode
DeleteNode.summary: Deletes a shard or mongos node from an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries the database accounts of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.title: DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig
DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.summary: Queries the Operation and Maintenance (O&M) task configuration for a MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTask.title: DescribeActiveOperationTask
DescribeActiveOperationTask.summary: Queries the detailed information about  tasks of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount.title: DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount
DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount.summary: Queries the number of operation and maintenance tasks on an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTaskRegion.title: Query maintenance task types and task quantities.
DescribeActiveOperationTaskRegion.summary: Queries the types and number of O&M tasks for a MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTaskType.title: DescribeActiveOperationTaskType
DescribeActiveOperationTaskType.summary: Queries the types of Operation and Maintenance tasks and the number of tasks of each type for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTasks.title: DescribeActiveOperationTasks
DescribeActiveOperationTasks.summary: Queries the details of scheduled operations and maintenance (O&M) tasks for a MongoDB instance.

DescribeAuditLogFilter.title: DescribeAuditLogFilter
DescribeAuditLogFilter.summary: Queries the types of entries in the audit log collected for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeAuditPolicy.title: DescribeAuditPolicy
DescribeAuditPolicy.summary: Queries whether the audit log feature is enabled for a MongoDB instance.

DescribeAuditRecords.title: DescribeAuditRecords
DescribeAuditRecords.summary: Queries the audit logs of a MongoDB instance.

DescribeAvailabilityZones.title: DescribeAvailabilityZones
DescribeAvailabilityZones.summary: Queries a list of the zones that are supported by an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeAvailableEngineVersion.title: DescribeAvailableEngineVersion
DescribeAvailableEngineVersion.summary: Queries the engine versions to which an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance can be upgraded.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the available resources in the specified zone.

DescribeBackupDBs.title: DescribeBackupDBs
DescribeBackupDBs.summary: Queries the databases at a specified time or the databases in a specified backup set before you restore a database for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup policy of a MongoDB instance.

DescribeBackupStorage.title: DescribeBackupStorage
DescribeBackupStorage.summary: Queries the backup usage for a MongoDB replica set or sharded cluster instance that uses cloud disks.

DescribeBackupTasks.title: DescribeBackupTasks
DescribeBackupTasks.summary: Queries ongoing backup jobs for MongoDB ReplicaSet or sharded cluster instances that use cloud disks.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries the backups of a MongoDB instance.

DescribeClusterBackups.title: DescribeClusterBackups
DescribeClusterBackups.summary: Queries the cluster backup sets for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance that uses cloud disks.

DescribeClusterRecoverTime.title: DescribeClusterRecoverTime
DescribeClusterRecoverTime.summary: Queries the recoverable time range of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance with disk storage.

DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeDBInstanceAttribute
DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey.title: DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey
DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey.summary: Queries the details of a key for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.title: DescribeDBInstanceMonitor
DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.summary: Queries the collection frequency of monitoring data for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstancePerformance.title: DescribeDBInstancePerformance
DescribeDBInstancePerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of a MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstanceSSL.title: DescribeDBInstanceSSL
DescribeDBInstanceSSL.summary: Queries the details of the SSL configuration for a MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstanceSwitchLog.title: DescribeDBInstanceSwitchLog
DescribeDBInstanceSwitchLog.summary: Queries the primary/secondary switching logs of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstanceTDEInfo.title: DescribeDBInstanceTDEInfo
DescribeDBInstanceTDEInfo.summary: Queries whether Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) is enabled for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeDBInstances.title: DescribeDBInstances
DescribeDBInstances.summary: Queries a list of MongoDB instances.

DescribeDBInstancesOverview.title: DescribeDBInstancesOverview
DescribeDBInstancesOverview.summary: Queries the overview of one or more ApsaraDB for MongoDB instances.

DescribeErrorLogRecords.title: DescribeErrorLogRecords
DescribeErrorLogRecords.summary: Queries entries in error logs of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroup
DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Queries the global IP whitelist template of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Queries the mapping between an instance and a global IP address whitelist template.

DescribeHistoryTasks.title: DescribeHistoryTasks
DescribeHistoryTasks.summary: Queries a list of tasks in the task center.

DescribeHistoryTasksStat.title: DescribeHistoryTasksStat
DescribeHistoryTasksStat.summary: Queries the overview of a task in the task center.

DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: You can call this operation to query whether auto-renewal is enabled for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeInstanceRecoverTime.title: DescribeInstanceRecoverTime
DescribeInstanceRecoverTime.summary: Queries the recoverable time range for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB replica set instance with disk storage.

DescribeKernelReleaseNotes.title: DescribeKernelReleaseNotes
DescribeKernelReleaseNotes.summary: Queries the release notes of the minor versions of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeKmsKeys.title: DescribeKmsKeys
DescribeKmsKeys.summary: Queries Key Management Service (KMS) keys that are available for disk encryption.

DescribeMongoDBLogConfig.title: DescribeMongoDBLogConfig
DescribeMongoDBLogConfig.summary: Queries the logging configurations of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeParameterModificationHistory.title: DescribeParameterModificationHistory
DescribeParameterModificationHistory.summary: Queries the parameter modification records of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeParameterTemplates.title: DescribeParameterTemplates
DescribeParameterTemplates.summary: Queries the default parameter templates for MongoDB instances.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: Queries the parameter settings of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the price of an instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries all regions and zones supported for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeRenewalPrice.title: DescribeRenewalPrice
DescribeRenewalPrice.summary: Queries the monthly renewal price of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeReplicaSetRole.title: DescribeReplicaSetRole
DescribeReplicaSetRole.summary: Queries the role and connection information of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeRestoreDBInstanceList.title: DescribeRestoreDBInstanceList
DescribeRestoreDBInstanceList.summary: Queries ApsaraDB for MongoDB instances whose backups are restored within seven days.

DescribeRoleTagStatus.title: DescribeRoleTagStatus
DescribeRoleTagStatus.summary: Describes the status of a tag for a node.

DescribeRoleZoneInfo.title: DescribeRoleZoneInfo
DescribeRoleZoneInfo.summary: Queries the role and zone of each node in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeRunningLogRecords.title: DescribeRunningLogRecords
DescribeRunningLogRecords.summary: Queries the operational logs of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.title: DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration
DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Queries the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) security groups that are associated with an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeSecurityIps.title: DescribeSecurityIps
DescribeSecurityIps.summary: You can call this operation to query the IP whitelists of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeShardingNetworkAddress.title: DescribeShardingNetworkAddress
DescribeShardingNetworkAddress.summary: Retrieves the connection information for a MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

DescribeSlowLogRecords.title: DescribeSlowLogRecords
DescribeSlowLogRecords.summary: Queries the details of entries in slow query logs of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries all tags in a specified region.

DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.title: DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList
DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.summary: Queries the custom keys for an instance.

DescribeVpcsForMongoDB.title: DescribeVpcsForMongoDB
DescribeVpcsForMongoDB.summary: Queries a paginated list of VPCs.

DestroyInstance.title: DestroyInstance
DestroyInstance.summary: Destroys an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

EvaluateResource.title: EvaluateResource
EvaluateResource.summary: Checks whether sufficient resources are available in a region in which you want to create or upgrade an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the relationship between ApsaraDB for MongoDB instances and tags.

MigrateAvailableZone.title: MigrateAvailableZone
MigrateAvailableZone.summary: Migrates an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance to a specific zone.

MigrateToOtherZone.title: MigrateToOtherZone
MigrateToOtherZone.summary: You can call this operation to migrate an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance to another zone.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of the root account in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.title: ModifyActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig
ModifyActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.summary: Modifies the Operations and Maintenance (O&M) task configuration for a MongoDB instance.

ModifyActiveOperationTasks.title: ModifyActiveOperationTasks
ModifyActiveOperationTasks.summary: Modifies the switching time of scheduled O\\\\\\&M tasks for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyAuditLogFilter.title: ModifyAuditLogFilter
ModifyAuditLogFilter.summary: Queries the types of logs collected by the audit log feature of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyAuditPolicy.title: ModifyAuditPolicy
ModifyAuditPolicy.summary: Enables or disables the audit log feature or configures the log storage duration for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyBackupExpireTime.title: ModifyBackupExpireTime
ModifyBackupExpireTime.summary: Modifies the time-to-live (TTL) of a MongoDB backup set.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the backup policy of a MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.summary: Modifies the endpoint and port of a MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDescription.title: ModifyDBInstanceDescription
ModifyDBInstanceDescription.summary: Modifies the name of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDiskType.title: ModifyDBInstanceDiskType
ModifyDBInstanceDiskType.summary: Modifies the disk type of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMonitor.title: ModifyDBInstanceMonitor
ModifyDBInstanceMonitor.summary: You can call this operation to set the monitoring granularity for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceNetExpireTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceNetExpireTime
ModifyDBInstanceNetExpireTime.summary: Extends the retention period of the classic network endpoint of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.title: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.summary: Changes the network type of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceSSL.title: ModifyDBInstanceSSL
ModifyDBInstanceSSL.summary: Modifies the SSL configuration of a MongoDB instance.

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the instance type or storage capacity of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB standalone instance, replica set instance, or Serverless instance. Serverless instances are available only on the Alibaba Cloud China Website (www.aliyun.com).

ModifyDBInstanceTDE.title: ModifyDBInstanceTDE
ModifyDBInstanceTDE.summary: Modifies the Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) status of a MongoDB instance.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Modifies the global IP whitelist template associated with an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.summary: Modifies the name of a global IP whitelist template associated with an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Modifies the mapping between a global whitelist template and an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Enables or disables auto-renewal for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.title: ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode
ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.summary: Disables password-free access over Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyNodeSpec.title: ModifyNodeSpec
ModifyNodeSpec.summary: Changes the instance type and storage space of a node in a MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

ModifyNodeSpecBatch.title: ModifyNodeSpecBatch
ModifyNodeSpecBatch.summary: Changes the configuration of one or more Mongos or shard nodes in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance.

ModifyParameters.title: ModifyParameters
ModifyParameters.summary: Modifies the parameters of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifyResourceGroup.title: ModifyResourceGroup
ModifyResourceGroup.summary: Moves an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance to a specified resource group.

ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.title: ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration
ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: You can call this operation to modify an ECS Security group that is bound to an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelist of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ModifySrvNetworkAddress.title: ModifySrvNetworkAddress
ModifySrvNetworkAddress.summary: Modifies the SRV connection address of a MongoDB instance.

ModifyTaskInfo.title: ModifyTaskInfo
ModifyTaskInfo.summary: Modifies the information of a task in the task center for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

ReleaseNodePrivateNetworkAddress.title: ReleaseNodePrivateNetworkAddress
ReleaseNodePrivateNetworkAddress.summary: Releases the internal endpoint of a shard or Configserver node for a sharded cluster instance.

ReleasePublicNetworkAddress.title: ReleasePublicNetworkAddress
ReleasePublicNetworkAddress.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

RenewDBInstance.title: RenewDBInstance
RenewDBInstance.summary: Manually renews an ApsaraDB for MongoDB subscription instance.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of the root account in an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

RestartDBInstance.title: RestartDBInstance
RestartDBInstance.summary: Restarts an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

RestartNode.title: RestartNode
RestartNode.summary: Restarts a single node of a MongoDB instance.

SwitchDBInstanceHA.title: SwitchDBInstanceHA
SwitchDBInstanceHA.summary: Switches the primary and secondary nodes for an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Binds tags to ApsaraDB for MongoDB instances.

TransferClusterBackup.title: TransferClusterBackup
TransferClusterBackup.summary: Switches the backup mode of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB sharded cluster instance to the cluster backup mode. After the instance is switched to the cluster backup mode, the instance supports high-frequency backup.

TransformInstanceChargeType.title: TransformInstanceChargeType
TransformInstanceChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of an instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription or from subscription to pay-as-you-go.

TransformToPrePaid.title: TransformToPrePaid
TransformToPrePaid.summary: Changes the billing method of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes a tag if the tag is not added to another instance.

UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.title: UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion
UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.summary: Upgrades the database version of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.title: UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion
UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.summary: Upgrades the minor version of an ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.
